title: Help! Linotype FontExplorer
content:
Hey, I just restarted my comp and now Linotype FontExplorer launches the Setup Assistant. Is there anything I can do to not have to reimport all my fonts and organize them again?

 [‹ Kerning in OTF and InDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007190048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32929 "Go to previous forum topic") [InDesign CS2 and font FILE names ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007190048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32972 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wyclef
